ygData.subject: Re: My New Persona
ygData.msgSnippet: GL and welcome back to Ever Quest! This is the most addictive game I personally have ever played. probably because in most games, you buy it, play it, defeat
ygData.messageBody:
GL and welcome back to Ever Quest! This is the most addictive game I
personally have ever played. probably because in most games, you buy
it, play it, defeat it, and move onto the next game. With EQ there
are events, guildies, and chatting with people from all over the
world. I'f your ever on "Quellious" feel free to send me a tell. I
tried other servers and was quickly bored with being a newbie in the
true sense of the word... LMAO. I hate having to start at the bottom,
scrape together pp for things because no way in __ I'm begging or
asking for it, and than meeting new people that usually end up
quitting EQ or are more interested in hooking up in RL.

If you need help with members to start a guild in the future let me
know and I'll create one, leave it there, so you have the amount
needed. The downside is web design, management, if members fight or
don't get long the childish games, and so on... but in the end it can
feel good to be running your own thing.

._.-~*~-.Beverly R.-~*~-._.-~*~-._

P.O. Box 15192
Sacramento, CA 95813
"Before we can break free from what binds us we must first realize we
are locked up".

--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, PsyKo
<sibilant_ghost@y...> wrote:
> Some of you may remember me in my attempts at creating
> guilds, But I am glad to report I will be returning to
> the realm of EQ once again. After selling my computer
> to buy a plane ticket home from chicago I have gone
> without EQ for 5 months now, and in 2 months time I
> will be returning to this wonderful realm under the
> guise of a warrior. And If I can pay off a friend of
> mine IRL I will be starting with a full suit of cobalt
> armor, so look for the newbie in cobalt on the
> Tribunal. Good luck all I will post when I am up and
> running again. Sincerely, PsyKo
